skill.name: Poison Dart
skill.description:
This is a Signature spell. Signature spells are free to cast.

Shoot a deadly Poison Dart that deals 185% weapon damage as Poison and an additional 40% weapon damage as Poison over 2 seconds.
skill.descriptionHtml:
This is a Signature spell. Signature spells are free to cast.

Shoot a deadly Poison Dart that deals 185% weapon damage as Poison and an additional 40% weapon damage as Poison over 2 seconds.

rune.name: Spined Dart
rune.description: Gain 50 Mana every time a Poison Dart hits an enemy. Converts the damage type to Physical.
rune.descriptionHtml: Gain 50 Mana every time a Poison Dart hits an enemy. Converts the damage type to Physical.

skill.name: Piranhas
skill.description:
Cost: 250 Mana
Cooldown: 8 seconds

Summons a pool of deadly piranhas that deals 400% weapon damage as Poison over 8 seconds.  Affected enemies will also take 15% increased damage.
skill.descriptionHtml:
Cost: 250 Mana

Cooldown: 8 seconds

Summons a pool of deadly piranhas that deals 400% weapon damage as Poison over 8 seconds. Affected enemies will also take 15% increased damage.

rune.name: Piranhado
rune.description:
The pool of piranhas becomes a tornado of piranhas that lasts 4 seconds.  Nearby enemies are periodically sucked into the tornado.

Increases the cooldown to 16 seconds.
rune.descriptionHtml:
The pool of piranhas becomes a tornado of piranhas that lasts 4 seconds. Nearby enemies are periodically sucked into the tornado.

Increases the cooldown to 16 seconds.

skill.name: Spirit Walk
skill.description:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Leave your physical body and enter the spirit realm for 2 seconds. While in the spirit realm, your movement is unhindered.

This ability does not start its cooldown until after its effects expire.
skill.descriptionHtml:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Leave your physical body and enter the spirit realm for 2 seconds. While in the spirit realm, your movement is unhindered.

This ability does not start its cooldown until after its effects expire.

rune.name: Jaunt
rune.description: Increase the duration of Spirit Walk to 3 seconds.
rune.descriptionHtml: Increase the duration of Spirit Walk to 3 seconds.

skill.name: Soul Harvest
skill.description:
Cooldown: 12 seconds

Feed on the life force of enemies within 18 yards. Gain 3% Intelligence for 30 seconds for each affected enemy. This effect stacks up to 5 times.
skill.descriptionHtml:
Cooldown: 12 seconds

Feed on the life force of enemies within 18 yards. Gain 3% Intelligence for 30 seconds for each affected enemy. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

rune.name: Languish
rune.description: Increase your Armor by 10% per harvested enemy and reduce their movement speed by 80% for 5 seconds.
rune.descriptionHtml: Increase your Armor by 10% per harvested enemy and reduce their movement speed by 80% for 5 seconds.

skill.name: Fetish Army
skill.description:
Cooldown: 120 seconds

Summon an army of 5 dagger-wielding Fetishes to fight by your side for 20 seconds. The Fetishes attack for 180% of your weapon damage as Physical.
skill.descriptionHtml:
Cooldown: 120 seconds

Summon an army of 5 dagger-wielding Fetishes to fight by your side for 20 seconds. The Fetishes attack for 180% of your weapon damage as Physical.

rune.name: Legion of Daggers
rune.description: Increase number of dagger-wielding Fetishes summoned by 3.
rune.descriptionHtml: Increase number of dagger-wielding Fetishes summoned by 3.

skill.name: Horrify
skill.description:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Don a spectral mask that horrifies all enemies within 18 yards, causing them to tremor in Fear and be Immobilized for 3 seconds.
skill.descriptionHtml:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Don a spectral mask that horrifies all enemies within 18 yards, causing them to tremor in Fear and be Immobilized for 3 seconds.

rune.name: Frightening Aspect
rune.description: Gain 50% additional Armor for 8 seconds after casting Horrify.
rune.descriptionHtml: Gain 50% additional Armor for 8 seconds after casting Horrify.

skill.name: Fetish Sycophants
skill.description: When you hit enemies with your spells, you have up to a 15% chance to summon a dagger-wielding Fetish to fight by your side for 60 seconds.
skill.descriptionHtml: When you hit enemies with your spells, you have up to a 15% chance to summon a dagger-wielding Fetish to fight by your side for 60 seconds.
skill.flavorText: The denizens of the Unformed Land are mischievous and drawn to power, always seeking to intrude upon our world, but too fickle to stay for long.

skill.name: Spirit Vessel
skill.description:
When you receive fatal damage, you automatically enter the spirit realm for 2 seconds and heal to 50% of your maximum Life. 

This effect may occur once every 60 seconds.
skill.descriptionHtml:
When you receive fatal damage, you automatically enter the spirit realm for 2 seconds and heal to 50% of your maximum Life.

This effect may occur once every 60 seconds.
skill.flavorText: Everyone dies. Sometimes we must return to finish what we started.

skill.name: Grave Injustice
skill.description:
Gain 1% of your maximum Life and Mana and reduce the cooldown of all of your skills by 1 second when an enemy dies within 20 yards.

The range is extended by items that increase your gold pickup radius.
skill.descriptionHtml:
Gain 1% of your maximum Life and Mana and reduce the cooldown of all of your skills by 1 second when an enemy dies within 20 yards.

The range is extended by items that increase your gold pickup radius.
skill.flavorText: Only a fool tries to cheat death. The wise offer a fair trade.

skill.name: Confidence Ritual
skill.description: You deal 25% additional damage to enemies within 20 yards.
skill.descriptionHtml: You deal 25% additional damage to enemies within 20 yards.
skill.flavorText: Take your enemies into your confidence. Bring them close, so that they may share the fruits of your efforts.

skills.name: Heal
skills.description:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Heals you and the Templar for 193,112 Life.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Heals you and the Templar for 193,112 Life.

skills.name: Loyalty
skills.description: Regenerates 6437 Life per second for you and the Templar.
skills.descriptionHtml: Regenerates 6437 Life per second for you and the Templar.

skills.name: Onslaught
skills.description:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Delivers a massive blow to an enemy for 800% weapon damage.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Delivers a massive blow to an enemy for 800% weapon damage.

skills.name: Inspire
skills.description:
Increases your resource generation.

Mana: 7 per second.
Hatred: 1 per second.
Wrath: 1.1 per second.
Arcane Power: 1.4 per second.
Fury: 10% generated.
Spirit: 10% generated.
Essence: 10% generated.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Increases your resource generation.

Mana: 7 per second.

Hatred: 1 per second.

Wrath: 1.1 per second.

Arcane Power: 1.4 per second.

Fury: 10% generated.

Spirit: 10% generated.

Essence: 10% generated.

skills.name: Anatomy
skills.description: Increases Critical Hit Chance by 1.8% for you and the Scoundrel.
skills.descriptionHtml: Increases Critical Hit Chance by 1.8% for you and the Scoundrel.

skills.name: Charm
skills.description:
Cooldown: 18 seconds

Charms an enemy to fight for you for 8 seconds.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Cooldown: 18 seconds

Charms an enemy to fight for you for 8 seconds.

skills.name: Missile Ward
skills.description: Buffs you and the Enchantress, reducing damage from ranged attacks by 6%.
skills.descriptionHtml: Buffs you and the Enchantress, reducing damage from ranged attacks by 6%.

skills.name: Erosion
skills.description:
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Conjures a pool of energy that deals 330% weapon damage as Arcane over 5 seconds. Affected enemies will also take 3% increased damage.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Conjures a pool of energy that deals 330% weapon damage as Arcane over 5 seconds. Affected enemies will also take 3% increased damage.

skills.name: Focused Mind
skills.description: A 40 yard aura that increases attack speed for you and the Enchantress by 3%.
skills.descriptionHtml: A 40 yard aura that increases attack speed for you and the Enchantress by 3%.
